Text:
Thx for uploading. 




However, this one has poor audio-quality; extremely low & no sound in the left speaker.

seems to not be working for me.
anyone else had this problem?
ignore my last comment- its working in VLC. my media player must be broken.
The compression is sometimes really too visible.

Don't waste your time with this one, it's not worth it.
I've found another 700MB release (not available on TPB) which is just perfect and way better than this one.
It's working for me. Both audio and video.

Oh, and Finnish subtitles to this version from here:
http://www.opensubtitles.com/subtitles/3091346
